name: Scallops With Shiitakes, Lemon And Parsley
keywords: lemon juice, scallops, shiitake, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 12 large shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Melt 3 teaspoons of butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add the shiitakes and saute until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the scallops and cook until lightly browned and just cooked through, about 1 minute per side. Add 1 teaspoon of butter and toss to coat. Stir in the lemon juice, salt, pepper and parsley. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
